author: abcoathup
content: <@792822129019584562> assume Goerli nodes should use https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/releases/tag/v1.5.1 rather than https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/releases/tag/v1.6.0-rc.0 which is the version listed in the EF blog announcement: https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/03/08/goerli-shapella-announcement
